One movie that perfectly fits your docudrama preference is 'Find Me Guilty' (2006). It tells the true story of defense lawyer Ron Silver, played by Eddie Griffin, as he defends a man accused of a crime he didn't commit.

If you're interested in the behind-the-scenes legal drama, this film would be an excellent choice.

conversation.text: If you enjoyed the weird and thought-provoking elements in "The Breakfast Club," I'd recommend checking out "Old Yeller" as well. It's a classic about love, resilience, and the unexpected bonds formed with animals. Starring Burt Reynolds as Tom Sawyer, "Old Yeller" offers a heartwarming contrast to the quirky teenager dynamic in "The Breakfast Club."
